name: Stefan Mintert @ GitHub
tagline: The guy behind Linkwerk.com and Quarterquest.com
body:
Hi. My name ist Stefan Mintert. I live in [Hamburg](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamburg), Germany.

You can hire me or my company [Linkwerk](http://www.linkwerk.com/) for the following tasks:

* Interim management
* Start-up (Business Development, Business Model, Company Founding, etc.)
* IT consulting
* Software Development

My skills

* IT management
* Project lead
* Creative mind

My education

* Computer Science @ University of Dortmund (Master)

Other profiles:

* [on Xing](https://www.xing.com/profile/Stefan_Mintert)

Working on

* [Quarterquest](http://www.quarterquest.com/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
